
snap(-70,-70,-70)

sky(210,255,355)
fog(310,285,355)
ground(100,100,100)

.snap(-70,-70,-70)

.sky(400,150,0)
.fog(1000,150,0)
.ground(100,100,100)

fadefrom(13865)
density(8421503)
lightson()

name(Warhead's Revenge)

nlaps(20)

set(57,0,100000,-15000,180)

maxl(16,-16000,-18000)
maxt(13,56400,-13600)
maxr(16,46400,-18000)
maxb(13,-20400,-13600)
set(47,0,0,250,0)
set(15,0,0,250,0)p
set(33,0,1100,250,0)
set(15,0,5600,250,0)p
set(15,0,11200,250,0)p
set(15,0,16800,250,0)p
chk(42,0,16800,250,0)
set(17,0,21000,250,-90)pt
set(15,-4500,21000,250,90)p
set(15,-10000,21000,250,90)p
chk(42,-10000,21000,250,90)
set(17,-14500,21000,250,90)pt
set(20,-14500,25500,250,0)po
set(10,-14500,30500,250,0)p
set(10,-14500,35500,250,0)p
set(45,-15000,34000,250,90)
set(45,-14000,34000,250,90)
set(31,-14500,35500,250,0)pr
fix(41,-14500,35500,250,180)s
set(10,-14500,40500,250,0)p
set(10,-14500,45500,250,0)p
set(10,-14500,50500,250,0)p
chk(40,-14500,50500,250,0)
set(14,-14500,54500,250,0)pt
set(21,-10500,54500,250,90)p
set(15,-5500,54500,250,90)p
set(35,-3000,54500,250,90)pr
set(15,0,54500,250,90)p
